68882:
Rip your god
Fuck hopless self
Anti love you hold dear
Douse yourself in evil
Thought repression of your fear
...

Sanctioning the era of death
Force-fed deception
Still I hold my doubt
At the thought of human rule over earth
Understand impending overthrow assaults

Rebirth on the pawns within our society
...

Critical mass
I pray contagion of the feeble mind
Critical mass
I pray contamination deified

Bludgeon abortion
Lethal amputation
...

Promise brought down to nihil
Due to broken trust

It enrages me to slaughter
Necrophile experiences
...

Nightmare bleeds from my soul dripping down into my eyes
Embrace the tainted offering body surging with impurity
Kiss the burning hatred ground into my being
Without remorse without cause it resurrekts

Inject me
Infest me
Pray to me
Inject me
Infest me
...

Raging fury built inside
Hallowed point
Sick suicide
You can't see what dwells
Within these lies

Scripture leading to damnation
...

Our lives run different ways
Through the rain I see you in the sun
Our star shines anyway
If you wish upon it we are one

Dog eat dog
Every day
On our fellow man we prey
Dog eat dog
To get by
Hope you like my genocide

I find it such a shame
Through the pain I see things as they are
We're served up on a plate
The pedestal is high enough to fall
And if in time
We can see the errors of our ways
Would anyone change it anyhow
...

I feel so useless
So pointless
Nothing left for me to say
Laying in the corner
...

Jesus, cry for your children
No more torment for the good of creation
I am the cyst on heaven's gate
I was the end when there was no beginning

Ravage through the bodies
Searching for the reasons
Why you're raped and left for dead
...

Cold
Blue
Lifeless
Deathless
Illuminated by the machines
That hold you on this side

Anger or tear
So calm
Unaffected I cease to live
I fear my infection
Watching over your soul as you sleep

Why should I believe if God's not here to save me?

Condemned by our lord and our savior
I know now that I'm the son of no man
Knowing of the traps you've set for me
Why should I even try to save myself?
...

What you pray for, a maimed savior,
Bathed in rancor to punish their behavior
Your institution of persecution
One solution to start from a clean slate

...

The children will suffer underneath a cold black sky
A testament to their heathen destruction
Broken teeth on blood soaked soil
...

Deception, thorns and scars
The heart you held so close to you was cold before the war
Jesus, war-bringer, sow the seeds of death
...

Generations past counting days till the final time
Beaten down now the meek are mighty
The shattered seal ensures the bitter end
...

Your flesh a shrine to my soul torn from bone dripping crimson red
Your time is now I dream of death on ready wings with nothing left
...

The Feeding

The cross that feeds on your mind
I've seen the lies that reflect in your eyes
...

On New Year's day, the decree is inscribed
...

Faith, disease
My right to end your life
We see the lie behind the light

Droves of human waste
Darkened by their own depression
We serve ourselves, defy the word of God
Free will is the key to salvation

...

The withered thorns that caress my tainted flesh
The shattered halo that shattered all our dreams
We've been condemned by the pages of false hope
We've been caressed by each others' lives in death

Blood stained sheets
Mask our grief
Will render out tryst incomplete
(x2)
